data.scripts.terrain

Class MagicAsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.BaseTerrain
      • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.BaseRingTerrain
        • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin
          • data.scripts.terrain.MagicAsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.CampaignTerrainPlugin, com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidSource

    public class MagicAsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin
extends com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.terrain.AsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin
    This is a drop-in replacement for the vanilla AsteroidBeltTerrainPlugin.
    It allows configuration of:
    • chance of impact
    • movement force
    • chance of damaging impact
    • chance of damaging impact per ship
    • impact damage
    • impact damage per ship
    For example usage, see Roider Union by SafariJohn.
